query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'siteVisitReports' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'clientSignatureData' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE()
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PejtppQzUdF9US.e7bec8248b17 --database 2cukUCNz2S5THQpLSDbdYn --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'siteVisitReports' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'clientSignatureData' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE()
